ComicInfo.Title: Clan Building: Chapter 5 Bash
ComicInfo.Summary: The battle begins, a fight between the clones and the Manhattan clan over the meaning of 'free will'. While this happens we join the Xanatos family at the White House halloween party and learn more about the mysterious Illuminati.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-13 11:51:00. [CVDB113252]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Greg Guler, Karine Charlebois, Scott Saavedra
ComicInfo.Characters: Angela, Brendan Quarters , Brentwood, Broadway, Bronx, Brooklyn, Burbank, David Xanatos, Delilah, Dr. Sato, Elisa Maza, Fox, Gilly, Goliath, Hollywood, Hudson, Jeffery Robbins, Lexington, Malibu, Margot Yale, Morgan Morgan, Puck, Quincy Hemings, Sevarius, Shari, Thailog
ComicInfo.Teams: Gargoyles, Illuminati, The Clones, The Manhattan Clan
ComicInfo.Locations: Eyrie Building, Jeffery Robbins Home, Manhattan, New York City, Nightstone Unlimited, Washington D.C., White House
